column6: "HOLLYWOOD" PART 6 (OF 6) As the cameras roll, the real web-slinger is beaten by Doc Ock and hijacked by plane to Brazil! And what is the public reaction as the flick has its premiere? Plus: Something strange happens while Doc Ock is in S.H.I.E.L.D. custody.
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
